description.raw:
This pull request fixes the gains on the vehicle actuators so that tele-operation is largely restored, with some small workarounds required to tele-operate the hand-brake. This is based on the atlas_meshes branch, since the new pelvis allows much more stable seated behavior. It should also be tested with the 

Issues fixed:

* #176, vehicle responsiveness improved
* #124, min_brake_percent parameter added which causes deceleration when no gas is applied

Also, the VRCPlugin was modified to destroy the vehicle joint when changing /atlas/mode so the robot_enter_vehicle topic can be used to put the robot in the vehicle, then setting mode to nominal can test sitting in the car while unpinned.

UPDATE:

* retargeted to atlas_meshes_no_head_cage
* added u_leg collisions to mud_seat list
* merge with default
* Reduce max speed to 4.2 m/s and increase min_brake_percent to 4%

Also, the VRCPlugin was modified to destroy the vehicle joint when changing /atlas/mode so the robot_enter_vehicle topic can be used to put the robot in the vehicle, then setting mode to nominal can test sitting in the car while unpinned.
